name: SOGGS
description:
The classic game of SOGGS

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Use your mouse to drag around the little green square to dodge the harmful not-green squares. Collect orange squares to get a higher score and possibly get on the leaderboard!

4 different modes:

  • Classic
  • Bounce
  • Timed
  • Spelling

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Inspired by: https://storozhev-victor.itch.io/4fun

Music by: https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle
